page.para: The wind, the kite and me
The wind is blow/ing hard. It is good for fly/ing my kite.
But the wind gets strong/er. It pulls my kite from my hands.
I try to run af/ter my kite. But the wind blows me a/way!
The wind starts to spin a/round. It car/ries my kite e/ven high/er.
The wind picks me up as well. I am spin/ning a/round and a/round.
The wind is so strong! I do not know where my kite is now.
Fi/nal/ly the wind slows down. I am still spin/ning.
The wind stops and eve/ry/thing drops down. Where will my kite land?
It has be/come quiet. I can/not hear the wind an/y/more.
There is my kite! But I think we have done e/nough fly/ing to/day.
